_comment.text: There are some optional config options. Default values are listed below

massages.prompt_complete: Scan QR code above or login via provided link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_no_qr_complete: Login via provided link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_incomplete: Scan QR code above or open provided link in your web browser:
massages.prompt_no_qr_incomplete: Open provided link in your web browser:
